wikipedia_page.main: David Zowie Canada Batt (born 30 April 1981), known professionally as David Zowie, is an English DJ and record producer. He is best known for his song "House Every Weekend", which topped the UK Singles Chart in July 2015.

response: | 16 July || "House Every Weekend" || David Zowie || 54,929* || UK Singles Chart 16 July 2015
"House Every Weekend" is the debut single from British DJ David Zowie. It was released on 3 July 2015 by Virgin EMI Records.

On 31 October 2015 the brand launched THIS IS Live, a live event at 93 Feet East in London. The event was headlined by drum’n’bass duo Sigma, and featured DJs David Zowie and Scales. Footage of the whole event was streamed live into Spotify, a world first, as well as on to YouTube, Facebook and Twitter.
